text: Christina Johannpeter (24 February 1956 - 22 November 2006) was a Brazilian equestrian. She competed in two events at the 1988 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1956 births Category:2006 deaths Category:Brazilian female equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Brazil Category:Equestrians at the 1988 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Rio de Janeiro (city)
title: Christina Johannpeter
